```js { "fakeBrowser": true }
<Switch>
    <Route
        path="/user-form"
        render={() => (
            <FormInitialValuesHistoryProvider formName="userForm">
                {(initialValues) => (
                    <ModelFormProcessor
                        renderForm={formProps => (
                            <ModelForm
                                {...formProps}
                                model={UserModel}
                                fieldNames={['firstName', 'lastName']}
                            />
                        )}
                        initialValues={initialValues}
                        model={UserModel}
                        formName="userForm"
                    />
                )}
            </FormInitialValuesHistoryProvider>
        )}
    />
    <Route
        render={() => (
            <React.Fragment>
                <Link
                    to={{
                        state: {
                            initialValues: {
                                userForm: {
                                    firstName: 'Jon',
                                    lastName: 'Snow',
                                },
                            },
                        },
                        pathname: 'user-form',
                    }}
                >
                    Jon Snow
                </Link>
                <br />
                <Link
                    to={{
                        state: {
                            initialValues: {
                                userForm: {
                                    firstName: 'Dirk',
                                    lastName: 'Gentley',
                                },
                            },
                        },
                        pathname: 'user-form',
                    }}
                >
                    Dirk Gentley
                </Link>
            </React.Fragment>
        )}
    />
</Switch>
```
